The MEDEA Awards is a free competition launched in November 2007 and organised by the [https://media-and-learning.eu/ Media & Learning Association]. It aims to encourage innovation in the use of moving images and sound in education, across Europe and beyond.
The MEDEA Awards are integrated in the Media & Learning Conference, a yearly conference about the use of media in education which takes place in Brussels, Belgium.
